name: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent: The Game
name_original: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent: The Game
description: Just saw this movie a couple weeks ago and absolutely loved it, so I figured I'd (loosely) adapt it into a game in a retro, PSX style with a surreal twist! Based on the Hollywood film, help Nic Cage rediscover his love of acting. I made this in a week, so I couldn't add all I wanted to, but I still think it's pretty fun. It's like that game Getting Over It, but probably half as good and a tenth as polished.
